segments.text: Good morning . My name is John Smith . I'm an import manager .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How do you do , Mr . Smith ? My name is Thou Hong .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nice to meet You , Ms . Thou . We've learned that you specialize in the export of electronic products .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Will you please take a seat ? Mr . Smith , have you seen the display of our electronic products in the exhibition hall downstairs ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I had a look just now . I found some of the exhibits of excellent quality and beautiful design . I feel we
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure we can . You know , we've been in this line for more than twenty years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , Ms . Thou , we're a newly-established company , but we have wide connections with wholesalers and retailers all over America .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . We can hold more talks later on to iron out the details .
segments.speaker: S2
